message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope this revised offer meets your needs.

Bob, I understand your position, but $10,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit further, but I need something closer to my initial offer. How about $11,000? It's a fair compromise, and I'm confident you'll find it a good value.
Alice, thank you for considering my position. I'm still unable to meet at $11,000. I believe $9,500 would be a fair compromise for both of us. I hope this offer aligns better with your expectations.
